price: 23. Dat is de manier van Allah geweest met degenen die vóór jullie heen zijn gegaan. En jullie zullen geen verandering in de manier van Allah vinden.
arabic: سُنَّةَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِي قَدۡ خَلَتۡ مِن قَبۡلُۖ وَلَن تَجِدَ لِسُنَّةِ ٱللَّهِ تَبۡدِيلٗا

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: sunnata al-lahi allatī qad khalat min qablu walan tajida lisunnati al-lahi tabdīlan
